metaTags.metaTitle: Cloud-Based WAF Security | Web Application Firewall
metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare's WAF security service offers industry leading protection. See how our cloud-based WAF service can keep your applications secure.

metaImage.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare WAF
relatedBlades.subtitle: Block the latest attacks with our industry-leading web application firewall (WAF)
relatedBlades.copy: The Cloudflare WAF uses threat intelligence and machine learning powered  by platform intelligence from the Cloudflare connectivity cloud to stop the newest threats, including zero-days.

columnContent.title: Global threat intelligence
columnContent.description: The Cloudflare global network processes %{HTTPRequestsAtPeak} million HTTP requests per second at peak, providing unparalleled protection against the latest attacks, including zero-day exploits.

columnContent.title: Machine learning-based detection
columnContent.description: The Cloudflare WAF uses machine learning to automatically block emerging threats in real time.

columnContent.title: Fast deployment and easy management
columnContent.description: Customers can set up the WAF with just a few clicks, and our WAF integrates with the rest of our application security for full coverage. No training or professional services needed.

columnContent.title: Managed and custom rulesets
columnContent.description: On top of OWASP rules, Cloudflare managed rules offer fast zero-day protection, and custom rulesets enable organizations to tailor their WAF to implement organization-specific policies.

relatedBlades.copy:
The Cloudflare WAF runs on the Cloudflare global network and sits in front of web applications to stop a wide range of real-time attacks using powerful rulesets, advanced rate limiting, exposed credential checks, uploaded content scanning, and other security measures.

The WAF integrates with our analyst-recognized, industry-leading application security portfolio for comprehensive protection.

relatedBlades.title: Learn how Cloudflare uses machine learning to detect zero day before zero day.
Cloudflare Named a Leader in the Forrester Wave™: Web Application Firewalls, Q3 2022
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare has been recognized as a Leader in The Forrester Wave™: Web Application Firewalls, Q3 2022 report. Cloudflare received the highest score of all assessed vendors in the strategy category.

content.value: "With the Cloudflare platform, we're getting very high-powered, very technical [application security] detection and protections that take little to no effort to deploy — that's especially important for our organizations that already struggle with limited resources."
Deputy Director and Interim State CISO — State of Arizona

relatedBlades.title: The Cloudflare WAF helps you block attacks on your application such as OWASP Top 10 threats, account takeover attempts, malware file uploads, and many more.

columnContent.title: Block common attacks like SQL injection and cross-site scripting
columnContent.description: Cloudflare uses core [OWASP Top 10](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/security/threats/owasp-top-10/) rules to block the most widespread layer 7 attacks.

contentfulAsset.description: Prevent financial and identity theft icon

columnContent.title: Stop credential stuffing attacks
columnContent.description: Our WAF [prevents account takeover](https://www.cloudflare.com/zero-trust/solutions/account-takeover-prevention/) by detecting and blocking the use of stolen or exposed user login credentials.

columnContent.title: Detect malware in uploaded files
columnContent.description: WAF content scanning protects your web servers and enterprise network from malware by scanning files as they are uploaded to your application.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Explore more use cases

relatedBlades.title: CASE STUDIES
relatedBlades.description: Helping enterprises all over the world protect their applications

relatedBlades.title: Upgrade your website security and performance with WAF & so much more!

planFeatures.name: Web Application Firewall (WAF)
planFeatures.description: Cloudflare Web Application Firewall's intuitive dashboard enables users to build powerful rules through easy clicks and also provides Terraform integration. Every request to the WAF is inspected against the rule engine and the threat intelligence curated from protecting millions of websites. Suspicious requests can be blocked, challenged or logged as per the needs of the user while legitimate requests are routed to the destination, agnostic of whether it lives on-premise or in the cloud.

planFeatures.name: Accelerated Mobile Pages (AMP)
planFeatures.description: Mirage automatically optimizes image loading through virtualized and lazyloaded images. It detects the browser type of a visitor and optimizes performance for the particular device, improving the performance of images on a mobile connection.
